Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network

Class Connection

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.Observable
it.polimi.ingsw.network.Connection
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClientConnection, RemoteConnection
public abstract class Connection
extends Observable
implements java.lang.Runnable

Connection is an abstract class that is used for the network connection between client and server.

It both extends the Observable class since the fact that any disconnections has to be notified and implements the Runnable interface to permit a multithreading solution for a multiple players game.

It has:

  • A {@param socket} for the network connection

  • A {@param oos} to write Java objects
  • A {@param ois} to read Java objects
  • A boolean, {@param active} that if true indicates that the connection is active

  • Constructor Details

    • Connection

      public Connection()

  • Method Details

    • isActive

      public boolean isActive()
      A boolean method, synchronized between different players' connections.
      Returns:
      true if the connection is active

    • sendEvent

      public void sendEvent​(Event event) throws DisconnectedException
      Sends events in the network between client and server.
      Parameters:
      event - the event which has to be sent
      Throws:
      DisconnectedException - if it can't write the {@param event} in the ObjectOutputStream

    • receiveEvent

      public Event receiveEvent​(int timeout) throws DisconnectedException
      This method tries to read an Event from the socket, waiting at most for the specified time. If the timeout elapses before an Event is received or there is some network issue, a DisconnectedException is thrown
      Parameters:
      timeout - the maximum number of milliseconds that the connection waits before throwing a DisconnectedException
      Returns:
      the Event read from the socket input stream
      Throws:
      DisconnectedException - if the timeout elapses or there is some network issue

    • close

      public void close()
      Closes the Connection by the closing of the ObjectOutputStream and the ObjectInputStream. After this method, the connection is inactive

    • notifyDisconnection

      public void notifyDisconnection​(java.lang.String disconnectionMessage)
      Notifies a disconnection to the registered Observers
